Text: In my opinion, you're better off reading the MIT guide if you're new to the hobby, and Locks, safes, and security if you're into the advanced techniques.

Look at the original file, hissil.  I "cloned" this torrent to improve it's quality, going from shit to something readable.  It was a single .txt file with all the images in separate files.  I think the book's crap anyway, but just felt like making a bad torrent decent.
